detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#35-38) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#36)

Crowdsale.finalize() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#265-274) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-require(bool)(! isFinalized) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#267)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#265-274):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#270)
		- token.transfer(stakingWallet,remainingTokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#361)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized = true (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#273)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.finalize()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#L265-L274):
	External calls:
	- [finalization()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#L270)
		- [token.transfer(stakingWallet,remainingTokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#L361)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [isFinalized = true](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#L273)

Crowdsale.finalization() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#357-362) ignores return value by token.transfer(stakingWallet,remainingTokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ZinCrowdsale.sol#361)
